description: Model assignments for spec2cloud agent roles. Override per shell to tune cost/quality tradeoffs.

orchestrator.description: Coordinates phases and manages state. Needs good reasoning but runs frequently — balance cost and quality.

spec-refinement.description: Reviews PRDs/FRDs for completeness and feasibility. Highest quality model — this is the most valuable phase.

gherkin-generation.description: Generates Gherkin scenarios from FRDs. Good balance of quality and speed.

test-generation.description: Generates test scaffolding from Gherkin. Needs to produce correct code structure.

contract-generation.description: Generates API contracts, shared types, and infrastructure contracts from Gherkin + tests. Needs strong reasoning for cross-feature consistency.

implementation.description: Writes application code to pass tests. Core coding agent — needs strong coding ability.

test-verification.description: Runs tests and reports results. Simple task — fastest/cheapest model is fine.

deployment.description: Manages AZD provisioning and deployment. Needs to diagnose infrastructure issues.
